name: FlyDieRewind
description:
Face the ultimate challenge and use your skill to pilot through this highly addictive 3d flying shoot-em-up.

Our legendary flying ace Rocket San will not rest until she has flown to the furthest reaches.

INFINITE FUN*


Features:
- 256 levels,
- Upgradeable vehicles,
- Multiple game modes,
- Rewind live action,
- True 3d physics simulation,
- Avoid Lasers and Bombs,
- Collect Rockets, fuel, gems and various bonuses,
- Optional Ghost or Multiplayer modes,



- Easy control with a gentle slide of your thumb, even has a left handed mode!


*(fun may not be entirely infinite).
